# AI chat application for scientific research (2026-01-18 15:24Z)

_**User (2026-01-18 15:24Z)**_

We're making a webap frontend to AI models (starting with OpenAI GPT) with the usual UX but with added that if I highlight a piece of text a chat box appears on top and I can send a new message that will create a new node in the tree of chats, that I visualise on the left (we start with the root).

The usecase is for scientific research so that I can easily span new conversations in a branching structure in order to understand the concepts given by the AI model

Use react for the stack, let me put my OpenAI API key in a .env

---

_**Agent (model gpt-5.2-codex, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Planning minimal React app with Vite**

I'm preparing to create a basic React app using Vite with a minimal structure including .env for the OpenAI API key and essential files like package.json, vite config, and core components. The app will feature a left tree panel and a chat panel with selection-based overlay inputs to create new tree nodes linked to chat messages, integrating calls to OpenAI's chat completions API using the environment variable.
**Adding selection branch logic and project setup**

I'm planning to implement branch-from-selection logic triggered on text selection within assistant messages, showing a popover for user input to create a child node with context. The project will use React 18 in JavaScript with a minimal file set and dependencies, adding an .env.example and README mention plus a .gitignore before applying the multi-file patch.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Designing state and data structure**

I'm defining state with a map for nodes keyed by ID plus an ordered array for stable traversal, storing each node with id, parentId, title, and messages. I'm planning helper functions to add nodes and track the active node, preparing to handle conversation messages including a system prompt.
**Planning message flow and selection popover**

I'm designing sending messages with API calls that include a fixed system prompt and user/assistant messages per node, plus handling branching from selected text by creating new nodes initialized with that context. I'm outlining showing a fixed-position selection popover inside the chat area triggered on text selection, with logic to close it on outside clicks or escape, plus ref-based containment checks.</details></think>

---

<tool-use data-tool-type="unknown" data-tool-name="apply_patch">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **apply_patch**</summary>


Parameters:

```json
{
  "relativeWorkspacePath": "/Users/cosmo/Documents/projects/trees/src/App.jsx"
}
```
Additional data:

```json
{
  "codeblockId": "507b5926-e2e2-438a-b083-83ba622840cf",
  "codeblock": {
    "uri": {
      "scheme": "file",
      "authority": "",
      "path": "/Users/cosmo/Documents/projects/trees/src/App.jsx",
      "query": "",
      "fragment": "",
      "_formatted": "file:///Users/cosmo/Documents/projects/trees/src/App.jsx",
      "_fsPath": "/Users/cosmo/Documents/projects/trees/src/App.jsx"
    },
    "codeblockId": "507b5926-e2e2-438a-b083-83ba622840cf",
    "codeBlockIdx": 0,
    "content": "import React, { useMemo, useRef, useState, useEffect } from \"react\";\n\nconst SYSTEM_PROMPT =\n  \"You are a helpful research assistant. Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-4o-mini\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n    {\n      role: \"assistant\",\n      content:\n        \"Start a conversation and create branches by highlighting text in the chat.\",\n    },\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const [nodesById, setNodesById] = useState(() =&gt; ({\n    root: createRootNode(),\n  }));\n  const [nodeOrder, setNodeOrder] = useState([\"root\"]);\n  const [activeNodeId, setActiveNodeId] = useState(\"root\");\n  const [draft, setDraft] = useState(\"\");\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [error, setError] = useState(\"\");\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n  });\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; buildChildrenMap(nodesById), [nodesById]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    }\n  });\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setNodeOrder((prev) =&gt; [...prev, id]);\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const node = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([\n        ...node.messages,\n        { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n      ]);\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const userMessage = formatBranchMessage(\n      selectionPopover.text.trim(),\n      selectionPopover.draft.trim(),\n    );\n    const title = selectionPopover.draft.trim().slice(0, 48) || \"New branch\";\n    const newNodeId = addNode(activeNodeId, title, [\n      { role: \"user\", content: userMessage },\n    ]);\n    setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }]);\n      updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const top = Math.max(rect.top - 12, 12);\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside className=\"sidebar\"&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n          &lt;p&gt;Branches update as you highlight text.&lt;/p&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"tree\"&gt;{renderTree(\"root\")}&lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/aside&gt;\n      &lt;main className=\"chat\"&gt;\n        &lt;header className=\"chat-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;div&gt;\n            &lt;h2&gt;{activeNode.title}&lt;/h2&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"chat-meta\"&gt;\n              {activeNode.messages.length} messages\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          {isLoading &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"loading\"&gt;Thinking...&lt;/span&gt;}\n        &lt;/header&gt;\n        &lt;section\n          className=\"chat-area\"\n          ref={chatAreaRef}\n          onMouseUp={handleSelection}\n        &gt;\n          {activeNode.messages.map((message, index) =&gt; (\n            &lt;div\n              key={&#96;${message.role}-${index}&#96;}\n              className={&#96;message ${message.role}&#96;}\n            &gt;\n              &lt;div className=\"message-role\"&gt;\n                {message.role === \"user\" ? \"You\" : \"Assistant\"}\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;div className=\"message-content\"&gt;{message.content}&lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          ))}\n          {error &amp;&amp; &lt;div className=\"error-banner\"&gt;{error}&lt;/div&gt;}\n        &lt;/section&gt;\n        &lt;footer className=\"chat-input\"&gt;\n          &lt;textarea\n            placeholder=\"Ask something in this node...\"\n            value={draft}\n            onChange={(event) =&gt; setDraft(event.target.value)}\n            rows={3}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;button\n            type=\"button\"\n            onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n            disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n          &gt;\n            Send\n          &lt;/button&gt;\n        &lt;/footer&gt;\n      &lt;/main&gt;\n      {selectionPopover.visible &amp;&amp; selectionPopover.rect &amp;&amp; (\n        &lt;div\n          ref={popoverRef}\n          className=\"selection-popover\"\n          style={{\n            top: &#96;${selectionPopover.rect.top}px&#96;,\n            left: &#96;${selectionPopover.rect.left}px&#96;,\n          }}\n        &gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-title\"&gt;Branch from highlight&lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-preview\"&gt;\n            “{selectionPopover.text.slice(0, 140)}”\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;textarea\n            placeholder=\"Ask a new question for this branch...\"\n            value={selectionPopover.draft}\n            onChange={(event) =&gt;\n              setSelectionPopover((prev) =&gt; ({\n                ...prev,\n                draft: event.target.value,\n              }))\n            }\n            rows={3}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-actions\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              onClick={() =&gt;\n                setSelectionPopover({\n                  visible: false,\n                  text: \"\",\n                  rect: null,\n                  draft: \"\",\n                })\n              }\n            &gt;\n              Cancel\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className=\"primary\"\n              onClick={handleBranchSend}\n              disabled={isLoading || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()}\n            &gt;\n              Create branch\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      )}\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n};\n\nexport default App;\n"
}
```
User decision: **accepted**

Set up a Vite + React app that renders a branching chat UI with a left-hand tree, supports highlight-to-branch popover, and sends chat requests to OpenAI using a `.env` key (`VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY`). The branch popover appears on text selection inside the chat area and creates a new child node with context from the highlighted excerpt.

Details on where and why:
- Built the UI and branching logic in `src/App.jsx`, including selection handling, tree rendering, and OpenAI calls.
- Added base layout/styling in `src/styles.css` to match the split-pane UX and the floating popover.
- Created Vite scaffolding files (`package.json`, `vite.config.js`, `index.html`, `src/main.jsx`) and basic project docs in `README.md`.

Notes:
- I couldn’t create a `.env.example` file due to tooling restrictions on `.env*` files. Please create the `.env` manually as described below.

## How to run
- Install deps: `npm install`
- Create `.env` in project root:
  - `VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-key-here`
- Start dev server: `npm run dev`

## Files added/updated
- `package.json`, `vite.config.js`, `index.html`
- `src/main.jsx`, `src/App.jsx`, `src/styles.css`
- `README.md`, `.gitignore`

If you want, I can add persistence, streaming, or richer tree visualization next.

{\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const [nodesById, setNodesById] = useState(() =&gt; ({\n    root: createRootNode(),\n  }));\n  const [activeNodeId, setActiveNodeId] = useState(\"root\");\n  const [draft, setDraft] = useState(\"\");\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [error, setError] = useState(\"\");\n  const [treeView, setTreeView] = useState(\"graph\");\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n  });\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; buildChildrenMap(nodesById), [nodesById]);\n  const graphLayout = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let yCursor = 40;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: depth * 140 + 60, y: yCursor };\n        yCursor += 80;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childYs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].y);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childYs) + Math.max(...childYs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: depth * 140 + 60, y: mid };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: (maxDepth + 1) * 140 + 120,\n      height: Math.max(yCursor, 120),\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    }\n  });\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const node = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([\n        ...node.messages,\n        { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n      ]);\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const userMessage = formatBranchMessage(\n      selectionPopover.text.trim(),\n      selectionPopover.draft.trim(),\n    );\n    const title = selectionPopover.draft.trim().slice(0, 48) || \"New branch\";\n    const newNodeId = addNode(activeNodeId, title, [\n      { role: \"user\", content: userMessage },\n    ]);\n    setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }]);\n      updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const top = Math.max(rect.top - 12, 12);\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside className=\"sidebar\"&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n          &lt;p&gt;Branches update as you highlight text.&lt;/p&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"view-toggle\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"graph\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"graph\")}\n              aria-label=\"Graph view\"\n              title=\"Graph view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"6\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"18\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"12\" cy=\"18\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M8 6h8M7.5 7.5l3.5 8M16.5 7.5l-3.5 8\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"list\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"list\")}\n              aria-label=\"List view\"\n              title=\"List view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        {treeView === \"graph\" ? (\n          &lt;div className=\"tree-graph\"&gt;\n            &lt;svg\n              width=\"100%\"\n              height={graphLayout.height}\n              viewBox={&#96;0 0 ${graphLayout.width} ${graphLayout.height}&#96;}\n            &gt;\n              {graphLayout.edges.map((edge) =&gt; {\n                const from = graphLayout.positions[edge.from];\n                const to = graphLayout.positions[edge.to];\n                if (!from || !to) return null;\n                return (\n                  &lt;line\n                    key={&#96;${edge.from}-${edge.to}&#96;}\n                    x1={from.x}\n                    y1={from.y}\n                    x2={to.x}\n                    y2={to.y}\n                    className=\"graph-edge\"\n                  /&gt;\n                );\n              })}\n              {Object.entries(graphLayout.positions).map(([nodeId, pos]) =&gt; {\n                const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n                return (\n                  &lt;g\n                    key={nodeId}\n                    className={&#96;graph-node ${\n                      nodeId === activeNodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"\n                    }&#96;}\n                    onClick={() =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 60;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 120 + 60 };\n        xCursor += 180;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const userMessage = formatBranchMessage(\n      selectionPopover.text.trim(),\n      selectionPopover.draft.trim(),\n    );\n    const title = summarizeTitle(selectionPopover.draft.trim());\n    const newNodeId = addNode(activeNodeId, title, [\n      { role: \"user\", content: userMessage },\n    ]);\n    setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }]);\n      updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-4o-mini\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst summarizeTitle = (text) =&gt; {\n  const cleaned = text\n    .replace(/[\\u2014\\u2013]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/[^\\w\\s-]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, \" \")\n    .trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return \"New branch\";\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \");\n  return words.slice(0, 2).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n    {\n      role: \"assistant\",\n      content:\n        \"Start a conversation and create branches by highlighting text in the chat.\",\n    },\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildContextMessages = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  return path.flatMap((id) =&gt; nodesById[id]?.messages ?? []);\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const [nodesById, setNodesById] = useState(() =&gt; ({\n    root: createRootNode(),\n  }));\n  const [activeNodeId, setActiveNodeId] = useState(\"root\");\n  const [draft, setDraft] = useState(\"\");\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [error, setError] = useState(\"\");\n  const [treeView, setTreeView] = useState(\"graph\");\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n  });\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    }\n  });\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const contextMessages = buildContextMessages(activeNodeId, nodesById);\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const userMessage = formatBranchMessage(\n      selectionPopover.text.trim(),\n      selectionPopover.draft.trim(),\n    );\n    const contextMessages = buildContextMessages(activeNodeId, nodesById);\n    const title = summarizeTitle(selectionPopover.draft.trim());\n    const newNodeId = addNode(activeNodeId, title, [\n      { role: \"user\", content: userMessage },\n    ]);\n    setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([\n        ...contextMessages,\n        { role: \"user\", content: userMessage },\n      ]);\n      updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({ visible: false, text: \"\", rect: null, draft: \"\" });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const top = Math.max(rect.top - 12, 12);\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; }

Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-5.2\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst summarizeTitle = (text) =&gt; {\n  const cleaned = text\n    .replace(/[\\u2014\\u2013]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/[^\\w\\s-]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, \" \")\n    .trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return \"New branch\";\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \");\n  return words.slice(0, 2).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n    {\n      role: \"assistant\",\n      content:\n        \"Start a conversation and create branches by highlighting text in the chat.\",\n    },\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildContextMessages = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  return path.flatMap((id) =&gt; nodesById[id]?.messages ?? []);\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: rect.width / 2 - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: rect.height / 2 - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n    }\n  });\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: rect.width / 2 - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: rect.height / 2 - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-5.2\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst summarizeTitle = (text) =&gt; {\n  const cleaned = text\n    .replace(/[\\u2014\\u2013]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/[^\\w\\s-]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, \" \")\n    .trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return \"New branch\";\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \");\n  return words.slice(0, 2).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n    {\n      role: \"assistant\",\n      content:\n        \"Start a conversation and create branches by highlighting text in the chat.\",\n    },\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildContextMessages = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  return path.flatMap((id) =&gt; nodesById[id]?.messages ?? {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt;     "content": "import React, { useMemo, useRef, useState, useEffect, useLayoutEffect } from \"react\";\nimport ReactMarkdown from \"react-markdown\";\nimport remarkGfm from \"remark-gfm\";\nimport remarkMath from \"remark-math\";\nimport remarkBreaks from \"remark-breaks\";\nimport rehypeKatex from \"rehype-katex\";\n\nconst SYSTEM_PROMPT =\n  \"You are a helpful research assistant. Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-5.2\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst summarizeTitle = (text) =&gt; {\n  const cleaned = text\n    .replace(/[\\u2014\\u2013]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/[^\\w\\s-]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, \" \")\n    .trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return \"New branch\";\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \");\n  return words.slice(0, 2).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n    {\n      role: \"assistant\",\n      content:\n        \"Start a conversation and create branches by highlighting text in the chat.\",\n    },\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildContextMessages = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  return path.flatMap((id) =&gt; nodesById[id]?.messages ?? []);\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const [nodesById, setNodesById] = useState(() =&gt; ({\n    root: createRootNode(),\n  }));\n  const [activeNodeId, setActiveNodeId] = useState(\"root\");\n  const [draft, setDraft] = useState(\"\");\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [error, setError] = useState(\"\");\n  const [treeView, setTreeView] = useState(\"graph\");\n  const [sidebarWidth, setSidebarWidth] = useState(320);\n  const [graphScale, setGraphScale] = useState(1.8);\n  const [graphTranslate, setGraphTranslate] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 });\n  const [graphHasInteracted, setGraphHasInteracted] = useState(false);\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n    placement: \"above\",\n  });\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const inputRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n  const graphContainerRef = useRef(null);\n  const panStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startY: 0,\n    tx: 0,\n    ty: 0,\n  });\n  const resizeStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startWidth: 0,\n  });\n\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; buildChildrenMap(nodesById), [nodesById]);\n  const markdownComponents = useMemo(\n    () =&gt; ({\n      code({ inline, className, children, ...props }) {\n        if (inline) {\n          return (\n            &lt;code className={&#96;inline-code ${className || \"\"}&#96;} {...props}&gt;\n              {children}\n            &lt;/code&gt;\n          );\n        }\n        return (\n          &lt;pre className=\"code-block\"&gt;\n            &lt;code className={className} {...props}&gt;\n              {children}\n            &lt;/code&gt;\n          &lt;/pre&gt;\n        );\n      },\n    }),\n    [],\n  );\n  const graphLayout = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: rect.width / 2 - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: 90 - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n    }\n  });\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const contextMessages = buildContextMessages(activeNodeId, nodesById);\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI([\n        ...contextMessages,\n        { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n      ]);\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = event.clientX - rect.left;\n    const pointerY = event.clientY - rect.top;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside className=\"sidebar\" style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt;     "content": "import React, { useMemo, useRef, useState, useEffect, useLayoutEffect } from \"react\";\nimport ReactMarkdown from \"react-markdown\";\nimport remarkGfm from \"remark-gfm\";\nimport remarkMath from \"remark-math\";\nimport remarkBreaks from \"remark-breaks\";\nimport rehypeKatex from \"rehype-katex\";\n\nconst SYSTEM_PROMPT =\n  \"You are a helpful research assistant. Provide concise, precise explanations, \" +\n  \"use structured reasoning, and cite key assumptions when relevant.\";\n\nconst API_URL = \"https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions\";\nconst MODEL = \"gpt-5.2\";\n\nconst formatBranchMessage = (selectionText, userText) =&gt; {\n  return (\n    \"Use the highlighted excerpt as context for this new branch.\\n\\n\" +\n    &#96;Excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${selectionText}\"\"\"\\n\\n&#96; +\n    &#96;User: ${userText}&#96;\n  );\n};\n\nconst summarizeTitle = (text) =&gt; {\n  const cleaned = text\n    .replace(/[\\u2014\\u2013]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/[^\\w\\s-]/g, \" \")\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, \" \")\n    .trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return \"New branch\";\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \");\n  return words.slice(0, 2).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildContextMessages = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  return path.flatMap((id) =&gt; nodesById[id]?.messages ?? {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const sx = rect.width / graphLayout.width;\n    const sy = rect.height / graphLayout.height;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 16;\n    const targetXpx = rect.width / 2;\n    const targetYpx = nodeRadiusUser * graphScale * sy + paddingPx;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXpx / sx - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYpx / sy - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n      },\n    }));\n    setActiveNodeId(id);\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const contextMessages = buildContextMessages(activeNodeId, nodesById);\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n      });\n      return;\n    }\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = event.clientX - rect.left;\n    const pointerY = event.clientY - rect.top;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; **Analyzing circle size calculations**

I'm working through the calculations for the circle's radius in a scaled SVG. I realized that the radius in pixels (px) was computed wrongly; I thought it was too large due to the scaling factor. The scaling factors aren't matching up: my computed values are showing around 214px, but I'm seeing a circle that should only be about 38px. So, something's off—maybe the scaling factor for my viewBox dimensions needs re-evaluating. How can I clarify this?
**Clarifying SVG aspect ratio settings**

It seems that for SVG scaling with preserveAspectRatio set to xMidYMid meet, I need to be using a uniform scale based on the minimum of sx and sy. This ensures the viewBox fits the viewport while keeping the aspect ratio intact, but I previously mixed in separate scaling values. Maybe I should switch to preserveAspectRatio="xMinYMin meet" instead, which would anchor the top-left and reduce offsets. If I do that, it should simplify my calculations and align everything nicely at (0,0)!
**Adjusting SVG centering and scaling**

With preserveAspectRatio set to xMinYMin meet, I realized any extra space appears on the right and bottom because the scaling fits the SVG to the viewport. The user wants to keep the current x, so I think I should adjust only the y-axis. Changing it to xMidYMin meet could center the viewBox horizontally while aligning it to the top. For offsets, I’ll compute offsetX and offsetY accordingly, ensuring uniform scaling with s based on the minimum of widths and heights. That should simplify the calculations!
**Defining SVG positioning and padding**

I'm considering where to position the SVG view. If I want the root center of the circle to start at the very top, then I guess the target y-coordinate needs to be adjusted. I’m thinking of setting it to nodeRadiusPx plus a small padding. The user mentioned wanting the circle just below the graph area’s top, so I might use a padding of 16px. I need to remember to update the DOM path and adjust the onWheel calculations to ensure everything aligns with the viewBox scaling!
**Refining SVG zoom and pan functionality**

I’m diving into how to correctly implement panning and zooming for the SVG with the right scaling and offsets. Since the pan/zoom likely feels off, adjusting my calculations to ensure I'm converting pointer coordinates correctly to user units seems essential. I’m thinking of implementing a helper function to calculate the SVG viewport’s scale and offsets more accurately. I need to maintain the user's preferences while simplifying the process through effective use of refs and closures. Finally, I’ll patch things up to fit the user's needs more closely!</details></think>

```json
}
```

```json
}
```

{\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; (\n                          &lt;&gt;\n                            &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"-6\"&gt;\n                              {words[0]}\n                            &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                            &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"14\"&gt;\n                              {words.slice(1).join(\" \")}\n                            &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                          &lt;/&gt;\n                        ) : (\n                          &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"4\"&gt;\n                            {words[0]}\n                          &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                        )}\n                      &lt;/text&gt;\n                    &lt;/g&gt;\n                  );\n                })}\n              &lt;/g&gt;\n            &lt;/svg&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        ) : (\n          &lt;div className=\"tree\"&gt;{renderTree(\"root\")}&lt;/div&gt;\n        )}\n      &lt;/aside&gt;\n      &lt;div className=\"sidebar-resizer\" onMouseDown={handleResizerMouseDown} /&gt;\n      &lt;main className=\"chat\"&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"chat-frame\"&gt;\n          {isEmptyThread ? {\n                    setDraft(event.target.value);\n                    resizeInput(event.target);\n                  }}\n                  onKeyDown={handleComposerKeyDown}\n                  rows={2}\n                /&gt;\n                &lt;button\n                  type=\"button\"\n                  onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n                  disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                &gt;\n                  Send\n                &lt;/button&gt;\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          ) : (\n            &lt;&gt;\n              &lt;header className=\"chat-header\"&gt;\n                &lt;div&gt;\n                  &lt;h2&gt;{activeNode.title}&lt;/h2&gt;\n                  &lt;span className=\"chat-meta\"&gt;\n                    {activeNode.messages.length} messages\n                  &lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n                {isLoading &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"loading\"&gt;Thinking...&lt;/span&gt;}\n              &lt;/header&gt;\n              &lt;section\n                className=\"chat-area\"\n                ref={chatAreaRef}\n                onMouseUp={handleSelection}\n              &gt;\n                {activeNode.messages.map((message, index) =&gt; (\n                  &lt;div\n                    key={&#96;${message.role}-${index}&#96;}\n                    className={&#96;message ${message.role}&#96;}\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-role\"&gt;\n                      {message.role === \"user\" ? \"You\" : \"Assistant\"}\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-content\"&gt;\n                      &lt;ReactMarkdown\n                        remarkPlugins={[remarkGfm, remarkMath, remarkBreaks]}\n                        rehypePlugins={[rehypeKatex]}\n                        components={markdownComponents}\n                      &gt;\n                        {message.content}\n                      &lt;/ReactMarkdown&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                ))}\n                {error &amp;&amp; &lt;div className=\"error-banner\"&gt;{error}&lt;/div&gt;}\n              &lt;/section&gt;\n              &lt;footer className=\"chat-input\"&gt;\n                &lt;textarea\n                  ref={inputRef}\n                  placeholder=\"Ask anything\"\n                  value={draft}\n                  onChange={(event) =&gt; {\n                    setDraft(event.target.value);\n                    resizeInput(event.target);\n                  }}\n                  onKeyDown={handleComposerKeyDown}\n                  rows={3}\n                /&gt;\n                &lt;button\n                  type=\"button\"\n                  onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n                  disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                &gt;\n                  Send\n                &lt;/button&gt;\n              &lt;/footer&gt;\n            &lt;/&gt;\n          )}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/main&gt;\n      {selectionPopover.visible &amp;&amp; selectionPopover.rect &amp;&amp; (\n        &lt;div\n          ref={popoverRef}\n          className=\"selection-popover\"\n          data-placement={selectionPopover.placement}\n          style={{\n            top: &#96;${selectionPopover.rect.top}px&#96;,\n            left: &#96;${selectionPopover.rect.left}px&#96;,\n          }}\n        &gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-title\"&gt;Branch from highlight&lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-preview\"&gt;\n            “{selectionPopover.text.slice(0, 140)}”\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;textarea\n            placeholder=\"Ask a new question for this branch...\"\n            value={selectionPopover.draft}\n            onChange={(event) =&gt;\n              setSelectionPopover((prev) =&gt; ({\n                ...prev,\n                draft: event.target.value,\n              }))\n            }\n            onKeyDown={handleBranchKeyDown}\n            rows={3}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-actions\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              onClick={() =&gt;\n                setSelectionPopover({\n                  visible: false,\n                  text: \"\",\n                  rect: null,\n                  draft: \"\",\n                  placement: \"above\",\n                })\n              }\n            &gt;\n              Cancel\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className=\"primary\"\n              onClick={handleBranchSend}\n              disabled={isLoading || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()}\n            &gt;\n              Create branch\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      )}\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n};\n\nexport default App;\n"
```json
}
```
